docs.snippet: ROGER W. BABSON, the well-known satistician, has recently completed a study of commercial and financial conditions in foreign countries, both in Europe and America. A NEW YORK TIMES reporter has asked him to give this paper the result of his studies,...
docs.lead_paragraph: ROGER W. BABSON, the well-known satistician, has recently completed a study of commercial and financial conditions in foreign countries, both in Europe and America. A NEW YORK TIMES reporter has asked him to give this paper the result of his studies, and Mr. Babson has consented to do so.

headline.main: COMMERCIAL AND FINANCIAL CONDITIONS OF THE WORLD

docs.snippet: According to a cable dispatch to our neighbor The Tribune, "a potato, said to be impervious to disease and the original tubercle from which all potatoes take their origin, is reported to have been discovered in Peru. The "battata" or "papa," contrary...
docs.lead_paragraph: According to a cable dispatch to our neighbor The Tribune, "a potato, said to be impervious to disease and the original tubercle from which all potatoes take their origin, is reported to have been discovered in Peru. The "battata" or "papa," contrary to popular tradition, is not a native of Ireland.
docs.abstract: Editorial doubts rept of discovery of original species of potato in Peru

headline.main: THE FIRST WOMAN DIPLOMAT.; Miss Luisi Appointed Attache of Uruguay's Legation at Brussels.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 10. -- Argentina and Uruguay, in spite of the abundant harvests promised, are likely to meet a serious loss on account of the scarcity of labor. Both countries depend on Italian field workers, who arrive every October and depart...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Sept. 10. -- Argentina and Uruguay, in spite of the abundant harvests promised, are likely to meet a serious loss on account of the scarcity of labor. Both countries depend on Italian field workers, who arrive every October and depart in the following February or March.

headline.main: ITALY STOPS EMIGRATION.; Retaliates Against Anti-Cholera Rules of Uruguay and Argentina.

docs.snippet: The United Fruit ship Almirante, in yesterday from Colon, brought John J. McKelvey, President of the first American company to begin construction of an all-American railroad in the River Plata region of South America. The first American freight and...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Fruit ship Almirante, in yesterday from Colon, brought John J. McKelvey, President of the first American company to begin construction of an all-American railroad in the River Plata region of South America. The first American freight and passenger cars and the first American locomotives ever seen in that region have just been set up.

headline.main: AN AMERICAN-BUILT RAILWAY.; President of a Uruguay Line Tells of Its Construction.
